ad vīllam
Settings
Macrons (ā, ē, ī, ō, ū)
Additional Resources:

Dictionary Info Guide

Classical Pronunciation

Much easier than English.

Vowels

Lines above vowels (ā, ē, ī, ō, ū) are called macrons.
They show vowels that are long.

Compare the long and short vowel pronunciations below.


"ah" as in aha

"ah" as in father

"eh" as in pet

"ay" as in play

"ih" as in it

"ee" as in sleep

"ee" as in sleep

"ee" as in sleep

"ee" as in sleep

"ee" as in sleep

Dipthongs

Dipthongs are...

pronounced "eye"
